collectionMetadata.name: Students and Teachers In Schools
collectionMetadata.description:
1) Pre-University includes Junior Colleges, Centralised Institutes and Pre-U Centres. 
2) From 2008,  Autonomous schools (Auto) have been grouped under Government and Government-Aided schools.
3)"Spec Indep" refers to "Specialised Independent" and "Spec'd" refers to "Specialised". 
4) Teacher data is correct as at 31 December in each year. (Prior to 1996, data is correct as at June in each year)
